General.Name: Zenome
General.Description:
The Zenome project is a decentralized blockchain-driven database of genomic information. The platform supports the possibility to manage your genomic data while maintaining privacy and ability to make a profit from selling access to different parts of the genome. Some nodes are resource providers that store and process genetic information. Data exchange is secured through encryption and utilization of blockchain smart contracts.

The ZNA token (Zenome Token) is a utility token that powers decentralized economics of the Zenome platform. The token has the following functionalities: Payment - ZNA is the exchange unit in the internal ecosystem; Economic incentive - Engage users in interactions on the platform; Nodes are rewarded for providing disk space and CPU time Participants are rewarded for opening their genetic information. Security Deposit - A security deposit is required for secure data exchange.

Zenome will be holding its Presale on October 17, 2017. There will be a total of 320M tokens available, for $0.3 each at the offering. 

The main ICO details are yet to be announced. If you wish to learn more about Zenome main ICO, please visit the token sale terms page.

ICO.Description:
The Zenome project is a decentralized blockchain-driven database of genomic information. The platform supports the possibility to manage your genomic data while maintaining privacy and ability to make a profit from selling access to different parts of the genome. Some nodes are resource providers that store and process genetic information. Data exchange is secured through encryption and utilization of blockchain smart contracts.

The ZNA token (Zenome Token) is a utility token that powers decentralized economics of the Zenome platform. The token has the following functionalities: Payment - ZNA is the exchange unit in the internal ecosystem; Economic incentive - Engage users in interactions on the platform; Nodes are rewarded for providing disk space and CPU time Participants are rewarded for opening their genetic information. Security Deposit - A security deposit is required for secure data exchange.

Zenome will be holding its Presale on October 17, 2017. There will be a total of 320M tokens available, for $0.3 each at the offering. 

The main ICO details are yet to be announced. If you wish to learn more about Zenome main ICO, please visit the token sale terms page.

Token Reserve Split (75%):

  • 5% Team;                
  • 6.5% Zenome fund;
  • 62.5% Frozen;
  • 1% Marketing;

62.5% of the total ICO supply will be frozen and then distributed gradually during a 5-year period after 10x valuation growth. 

Presale Bonus Structure:

  • 25% bonus if sold out
